target.name: downloadRefSeq
target.description: Downloads files for RefSeq to staging area.

target.name: convertRefSeq
target.description: Converts FASTA files for RefSeq into blastable files in the staging area.

target.name: pushRefSeq
target.description: Pushes blast files for RefSeq to production from the staging area.

target.name: revertRefSeq
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the staging area.
